summary.span: 代表世界的任意時區。

span.span: Represents any time zone in the world.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時區是使用相同時間的地理區域。A time zone is a geographical region in which the same time is used. 類別會提供顯著的增強功能比類別，可提供有限的功能。The class offers significant enhancements over the class, which provides only limited functionality. 類別能夠辨識只有當地時區，並將 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 與當地時間之間的時間可以轉換。The class recognizes only the local time zone, and can convert times between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. A物件可以代表任何時區和方法類別可用來將一個時區中的時間轉換成任何其他時區中對應的時間。A object can represent any time zone, and methods of the class can be used to convert the time in one time zone to the corresponding time in any other time zone. 成員類別支援下列作業：The members of the class support the following operations: - 正在擷取的作業系統已經定義的時區。Retrieving a time zone that is already defined by the operating system. - 列舉系統可用的時區。Enumerating the time zones that are available on a system. - 轉換不同的時區之間的時間。Converting times between different time zones. - 建立新的時區，尚未定義作業系統。Creating a new time zone that is not already defined by the operating system. - 序列化時間的時區，供日後擷取。Serializing a time zone for later retrieval. > [!NOTE] > 執行個體類別是不變。An instance of the class is immutable. 一旦具現化物件，則無法修改其值。Once an object has been instantiated, its values cannot be modified. 您無法執行個體化物件使用`new`關鍵字。You cannot instantiate a object using the `new` keyword. 相反地，您必須呼叫其中一個靜態成員的下表所示的類別。Instead, you must call one of the static members of the class shown in the following table. |靜態成員名稱Static member name|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| | 方法 method|從應用程式所提供的資料建立自訂時區。Creates a custom time zone from application-supplied data.| | 方法 method|具現化時區，根據其識別項。Instantiates a time zone based on its identifier.| | 方法 method|還原序列化的字串值來重新建立先前序列化物件。Deserializes a string value to re-create a previously serialized object.| | 方法 method|傳回可列舉的物件，表示所有本機系統可用的時區。Returns an enumerable of objects that represents all time zones that are available on the local system.| | 屬性 property|具現化代表當地時區的物件。Instantiates a object that represents the local time zone.| | 屬性 property|具現化代表 UTC 時區的物件。Instantiates a object that represents the UTC zone.| 您可以使用方法用來建立本機系統登錄在 Windows 系統或時區中的類別中未定義的時區[ICU 文件庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)Linux 或 macOS 上。You can use the method to create a time zone that is not defined in the local system registry on Windows systems or by the time zone classes in the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone) on Linux or macOS. 您可以接著使用儲存為字串時，這些都可以儲存至應用程式存取某種形式的時區物件之資訊的屬性。You can then use the property to save the time zone object's information as a string, which can be stored in some form that is accessible to the application. 您可以使用方法，將序列化的字串轉換回物件。You can use the method to convert a serialized string back to a object.

summary.span: 取得目前時區標準時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 的時差。

span.span: Gets the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 表示目前時區標準時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 時差的物件。

span.span: An object that indicates the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的時間範圍屬性的範圍可以從 14 小時 （14 小時之前 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區） 到-14 小時 （14 小時 utc 時區）。The time span returned by the property can range from 14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)) to -14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours behind UTC). 時區是 UTC 快有正面的位移。位於 UTC 的時區有負數位移。Time zones that are ahead of UTC have a positive offset; time zones that are behind UTC have a negative offset. 值以整數分鐘數表示。The value is represented as a whole number of minutes. 它不能包含小數的分鐘數。It cannot include a fractional number of minutes. > [!NOTE] > 因為是的屬性物件而非物件，類別適用於單一位移與 UTC 的時區調整所有。Because is a property of the object rather than the object, the class applies a single offset from UTC to all of a time zone's adjustments. 為了反映已修改其相對於 UTC 的時區，您必須建立新的時區使用方法。To reflect a time zone that has modified its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone using the method. 屬性不同於方法如下：The property differs from the method in the following ways: - 屬性會傳回 UTC 與時區標準時間; 之間的差異方法會傳回 UTC 與時區的時間，在特定時間點之間的差異時間。The property returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's standard time; the method returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's time at a particular point in time. - 方法會反映任何調整規則的應用程式的時區;屬性則否。The method reflects the application of any adjustment rules to the time zone; the property does not. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示當地時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 之間的差異。The following example uses the property to display the difference between the local time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Examples 下列範例會將在美國、 加拿大東部時區時間的日期和時間值的陣列。The following example converts an array of date and time values to times in the Eastern Time zone of the U.S. and Canada. 它會顯示來源時區，取決於來源屬性值。It shows that the source time zone depends on the property of the source value. 它也說明了方法會採用會調整時區考量，因為時區調整在來源和目的地時區中是發生在上午 2:00It also illustrates that the method takes time zone adjustments into account, because a time zone adjustment occurs in both the source and destination time zones at 2:00 A.M. 在 2010 年 11 月 7日日。on November 7, 2010. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法適合用來建立具有不會調整 （也就是不支援日光節約時間的時間區域） 的時區。This overload of the method is suitable for creating a time zone that has no adjustments (that is, a time zone that does not support daylight saving time). 若要定義包括調整日光節約時間的時區，請使用或方法。To define a time zone that includes adjustments for daylight saving time, use either the or the method. 下表顯示提供給參數之間的關聯性方法和屬性方法呼叫所傳回的物件。The following table shows the relationship between the parameters that are provided to the method and the properties of the object that are returned by the method call. |CreateCustomTimeZone 參數CreateCustomTimeZone parameter|TimeZoneInfo 屬性TimeZoneInfo property| |------------------------------------|---------------------------| |`id`|| |`baseUtcOffset`|| |`displayName`|| |`standardDisplayName`|| 一般而言，時區標準時間名稱和其識別碼都相同。Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same. 不過，時區的識別項的長度不可超過 32 個字元。However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters. 將字串傳遞至`displayName`參數會遵循相當標準的格式。The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間，會以縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），以括弧括住的時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 這被後面接著識別時區本身，或一或多個城市、 地區或國家/地區的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如：For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂的時區，茂遜，荷美灣南極大陸的區域。The following example creates a custom time zone for the Mawson and Holme Bay regions of Antarctica. 然後，它會顯示將當地時間轉換成新的時區時間的結果。It then displays the result of converting the local time to the time in the new time zone. objects returned by the method.| 一般而言，時區標準時間名稱和其識別碼都相同。Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same. 不過，時區的識別項的長度不可超過 32 個字元。However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters. 將字串傳遞至`displayName`參數會遵循相當標準的格式。The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間，會以縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），以括弧括住的時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 這被後面接著識別時區本身，或一或多個城市、 地區或國家/地區的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如：For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` `baseUtcOffset`參數定義的自訂時區的位移與 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區的調整規則的所有。The `baseUtcOffset` parameter defines the custom time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for all of the time zone's adjustment rules. 換句話說，物件模型假設與 UTC 的時區位移的時區，生命週期的常數，且有獨立於特定的調整規則。In other words, the object model assumes that the time zone's offset from UTC is constant throughout the life of the time zone, and exists independent of particular adjustment rules. 為了反映已變更其相對於 UTC 的時區，您必須建立新的時區物件。To reflect a time zone that has changed its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone object. 透過下列方式定義的時區調整規則：A time zone's adjustment rules are defined by doing the following: 1. 呼叫或方法來定義開始和結束轉換每個調整規則的時間。Calling either the or the method to define the starting and ending transition time for each adjustment rule. 2. 呼叫針對每個調整規則的方法。Calling the method for each adjustment rule. 3. 將調整規則指派給陣列可以當做傳遞`adjustmentRules`參數。Assigning the adjustment rules to an array that can be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂的時區，帕麥站和爾島南極大陸。The following example creates a custom time zone for the Palmer station and Anvers Island in Antarctica. 然後它會將當地時間轉換為新時區的時間，並顯示結果。It then converts the local time to the time in the new time zone and displays the result. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用的這個多載方法，以建立在執行階段條件可以決定其支援日光節約時間的自訂時區。You can use this overload of the method to create a custom time zone whose support for daylight saving time can be determined by conditions at run time. 下表顯示提供給參數之間的關聯性方法和成員方法呼叫所傳回的物件。The following table shows the relationship between the parameters that are provided to the method and the members of the object that are returned by the method call. |CreateCustomTimeZone 參數CreateCustomTimeZone parameter|TimeZoneInfo 屬性TimeZoneInfo property| |------------------------------------|---------------------------| |`id`|| |`baseUtcOffset`|| |`displayName`|| |`standardDisplayName`|| |`daylightDisplayName`| 如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`是`false`;如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`是`true`。 if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `false`; if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `true`.| |`adjustmentRules`|陣列所傳回的物件方法如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`是`false`; 所傳回的空陣列方法如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`是`true`。An array of objects returned by the method if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `false`; an empty array returned by the method if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `true`.| |`disableDaylightSavingTime`|不。Not .| 一般而言，時區標準時間名稱和其識別碼都相同。Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same. 不過，時區的識別項的長度不可超過 32 個字元。However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters. 將字串傳遞至`displayName`參數會遵循相當標準的格式。The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間，會以縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），以括弧括住的時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 這被後面接著識別時區本身，或一或多個城市、 地區或國家/地區的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如: For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` 透過下列方式定義的時區調整規則：A time zone's adjustment rules are defined by doing the following: 1. 呼叫或方法來定義開始和結束每個調整規則的轉換規則。Calling either the or the method to define the starting and ending transition rules for each adjustment rule. 2. 呼叫針對每個調整規則的方法。Calling the method for each adjustment rule. 3. 將調整規則指派給陣列可以當做傳遞`adjustmentRules`參數。Assigning the adjustment rules to an array that can be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter. 如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`參數是`false`，此方法的作業相當於多載。If `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter is `false`, the operation of this method is identical to the overload. 如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`已`true`，傳回的物件包含沒有調整規則和屬性且值為空字串。If `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `true`, the returned object includes no adjustment rules and a property whose value is an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂的時區，帕麥站和爾島南極大陸。The following example creates a custom time zone for the Palmer station and Anvers Island in Antarctica. 它會設定`disableDaylightSavingTime`的呼叫中的參數方法，以`true`。It sets the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter in the call to the method to `true`. 然後，它會顯示新時區的日光節約時間名稱，如果有的話，並確認新的時區具有任何日光節約時間資訊的調整規則的數目。It then displays the new time zone's daylight saving time name, if one is present, and the number of adjustment rules to confirm that the new time zone has no daylight saving time information. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據 Windows 作業系統安裝的文化特性當地語系化的顯示名稱。The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system. A屬性的值不是或`null`不一定表示時區支援日光節約時間。A property whose value is not or `null` does not necessarily indicate that the time zone supports daylight saving time. 若要判斷是否時區支援日光節約時間，請檢查的值及其屬性。To determine whether the time zone supports daylight saving time, check the value of its property. 在大部分情況下，`DaylightName`不是屬性系統定莪時區或`null`。In most cases, the `DaylightName` property of system-defined time zones is not or `null`. 不過，屬性的自訂時區可以設定為。However, the property of custom time zones can be set to . 建立自訂時區時，發生這種的情況或多載而`disableDaylightSavingTime`參數是`true`。This occurs when custom time zones are created by the or the overload and the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter is `true`. 因此，您的程式碼應該永遠不會假設的值屬性不是`null`或空白。Therefore, your code should never assume that the value of the property is not `null` or empty. 屬性就相當於屬性類別。The property is equivalent to the property of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為的方法`DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName`使用方法，以判斷是否要顯示的時區標準時間名稱或日光節約時間名稱。The following example defines a method named `DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName` that uses the method to determine whether to display a time zone's standard time name or daylight saving time name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據 Windows 作業系統安裝的文化特性當地語系化的顯示名稱。The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system. Windows 系統時區的時區顯示名稱會遵循相當標準的格式。Time zone display names for Windows system time zones follow a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間，會以縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），以括弧括住的時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 為 Coordinated Universal Time，沒有位移 GMT 縮寫被加括號。For Coordinated Universal Time, the GMT acronym with no offset is enclosed in parentheses. 這被後面接著識別時區或一或多個城市、 地區或國家/地區時區的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone. 例如：For example: ``` (GMT) Greenwich Mean Time : Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，代表當地時區，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents the local time zone and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. 輸出會顯示位於美國的系統太平洋標準時區。The output is displayed for a system in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks `id`參數必須確實對應到時區的識別項的長度，但不是在案例中，成功比對發生的事件; 也就是比較`id`時區識別項不區分大小寫。The `id` parameter must correspond exactly to the time zone's identifier in length, but not in case, for a successful match to occur; that is, the comparison of `id` with time zone identifiers is case-insensitive. 如果您想要擷取基礎部分符合結果的時區物件，您可以撰寫使用的唯讀集合的自訂程序所傳回的物件方法。If you want to retrieve time zone objects based on partial matches, you can write custom procedures that work with the read-only collection of objects returned by the method. 在 Windows 系統上`FindSystemTimeZoneById`會嘗試比對`id`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones 分支的登錄子機碼名稱。On Windows systems, `FindSystemTimeZoneById` tries to match `id` to the subkey names of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones branch of the registry. 在 Linux 和 macOS 上，它會使用提供的時區資訊[ICU 文件庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)。On Linux and macOS, it uses time zone information available in the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone). 如果登錄或程式庫並沒有您想要的時區資訊，您可以建立特定的時區是藉由呼叫其中一個多載方法或來電 800-659-3579還原序列化物件表示必要的時區。If the registry or the library does not have the information for the time zone you desire, you can create a particular time zone either by calling one of the overloads of the method or by calling to deserialize a object that represents the required time zone. 不過，這些方法呼叫所建立的時區不是系統定義的時間，而且無法使用擷取方法。However, time zones created by these method calls are not system-defined time and cannot be retrieved using the method. 只有透過所傳回的物件參考，可以存取這些自訂的時區或方法呼叫。These custom time zones can be accessed only through the object reference returned by the or method call. 這個方法會傳回新每個方法呼叫執行個體; 它不會傳回快取的物件。This method returns a new instance for each method call; it does not return cached objects. 這可能會影響呼叫的應用程式的效能`FindSystemTimeZoneById`方法重複使用相同的識別碼。This may impact performance in applications that call the `FindSystemTimeZoneById` method repeatedly with the same identifier. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取東京標準時間區域。The following example uses the method to retrieve the Tokyo Standard Time zone. 這東京中轉換為時間的本地時間，並判斷它是否東京標準時間或東京日光節約時間，然後使用物件。This object is then used to convert the local time to the time in Tokyo and to determine whether it is Tokyo Standard Time or Tokyo Daylight Time. summary.span: 擷取會套用至目前 物件的 物件陣列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取陣列物件。The method retrieves an array of objects. 陣列中的每個物件會定義該時區的調整，以及其差異生效的開始和結束日期 （確切的調整會導致時間變更的數量）。Each object in the array defines the effective start and end date of that time zone adjustment, as well as its delta (the exact amount by which the adjustment causes the time to change). 此外，兩個屬性會傳回定義每個標準時間的年度轉換發生時的物件。In addition, two properties return objects that define when each annual transition to and from standard time occurs. 如果時間的時區有多個調整規則，它們的一般順序從最早 （位於索引 0） 到最新版本 (位於索引-1)。If a time zone has multiple adjustment rules, they are generally ordered from earliest (at index 0) to latest (at index - 1). 如果時區不具有調整規則方法會傳回空陣列 (陣列的為零)。If a time zone has no adjustment rules, the method returns an empty array (an array whose is zero). 所傳回的陣列的項目修改方法不會反映在屬於特定時區的調整規則。Any modifications to the elements of the array returned by the method are not reflected in the adjustment rules that belong to a particular time zone. 若要修改的時區調整規則 （例如反映其歷程記錄轉換自日光節約時間） 您必須建立新的時區有適當調整規則，而不是修改現有。To modify a time zone's adjustment rules (such as to reflect its historical transition to and from daylight saving time) you must create a new time zone with the appropriate adjustment rules, rather than modify the existing one. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取所有的時區已定義於本機系統，並顯示完成其調整規則資訊至主控台。The following example retrieves all time zones that are defined on the local system and displays complete information about their adjustment rules to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的精確的行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性和物件，如下表所示。The precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property and the object, as the following table shows. |TimeZoneInfo 物件類型TimeZoneInfo object type|Kind 屬性值Kind property value|行為Behavior| |------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------| || 或 or |傳回模稜兩可的時間位移`dateTime`。Returns ambiguous time offsets for `dateTime`.| |||將轉換`dateTime`至當地時間，然後傳回該時間的模稜兩可的時間位移。Converts `dateTime` to the local time, and then returns ambiguous time offsets for that time.| ||任何值。Any value.|會擲回。Throws an .| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.| 或 or |將轉換`dateTime`到指定的時間區域，然後判斷該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the specified time zone, and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.||決定是否`dateTime`模稜兩可在指定的時區。Determines whether `dateTime` is ambiguous in the specified time zone.| 順序未定義這個方法所傳回陣列中的物件。The order of objects in the array returned by this method is undefined. 不過，您可以判斷哪個項目從時區標準時間表示的位移，藉由比較其值的時區屬性。However, you can determine which element represents an offset from the time zone's standard time by comparing its value with the time zone's property. 若要對應至時區標準時間的模稜兩可的時間，請參閱[How to:解決模稜兩可的時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md)。To map an ambiguous time to a time zone's standard time, see [How to: Resolve Ambiguous Times](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md). ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為的方法`ShowPossibleUtcTimes`使用方法，以將模稜兩可的時間對應至可以對應 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間。The following example defines a method named `ShowPossibleUtcTimes` that uses the method to map an ambiguous time to its possible corresponding Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) times. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/cs/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/vb/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.vb#1)] 呼叫此方法可以接著使用如下所示的程式碼：The method can then be called using code such as the following: [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/cs/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/vb/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的精確的行為取決於之間的關聯性的屬性`dateTimeOffset`參數和物件。The precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property of the `dateTimeOffset` parameter and the object. 如果值屬性會對應至目前時區的可能位移與 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 的日期和時間，方法會傳回可能的位移。If the value of the property corresponds to the current time zone's possible offsets from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for that date and time, the method returns the possible offsets. 否則，它會將轉換`dateTimeOffset`將目前的時區，然後再傳回可能位移的時間的日期和時間。Otherwise, it converts `dateTimeOffset` to the time in the current time zone, and then returns the possible offsets of that date and time. 順序未定義這個方法所傳回陣列中的物件。The order of objects in the array returned by this method is undefined. 不過，您可以判斷哪個項目從時區標準時間表示的位移，藉由比較其值的時區屬性。However, you can determine which element represents an offset from the time zone's standard time by comparing its value with the time zone's property. 若要對應至時區標準時間的模稜兩可的時間，請參閱[How to:解決模稜兩可的時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md)。To map an ambiguous time to a time zone's standard time, see [How to: Resolve Ambiguous Times](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md).

summary.span: 傳回有關本機系統上哪些資訊可用之所有時區的排序集合。

span.span: Returns a sorted collection of all the time zones about which information is available on the local system.

returns.span: 物件的唯讀集合。

span.span: A read-only collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從登錄 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones 機碼在 Windows 系統上進出的子機碼來擷取所有可用的時區資訊[ICU文件庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)在 Linux 和 macOS 上。The method retrieves all available time zone information from the subkeys of the registry's HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones key on Windows systems and from the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone) on Linux and macOS. 如果無法成功地擷取及剖析特定的字串屬性的個別值物件，這個方法會設定它們的值為空字串 ("")。If it is unable to successfully retrieve and parse values for particular string properties of individual objects, this method sets their value to an empty string (""). > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法傳回的集合中定義的時區的物件或 ICU 文件庫。The method returns a collection of objects only for time zones defined in the or ICU library. 它不包含時區使用多載建立方法。It does not include time zones created using the overloads of the method. 這些是只可透過存取時區建立方法所傳回的物件參考。These are accessible only through the object reference returned by the time zone creation method. 這個方法所傳回的集合被排序的 UTC 時差，並針對時區具有相同的 UTC 時差，以使用目前文化特性的顯示名稱。The collection returned by this method is sorted by UTC offset and, for time zones that have the same UTC offset, by the display name using the current culture. 顯示名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱。For information about the display name, see . 這個方法所傳回的物件支援介面，這表示使用者可以使用具重複它`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each…Next`（在 Visual Basic) 陳述式。The object returned by this method supports the interface, which means that it can be iterated using the `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each…Next` (in Visual Basic) statements. 迴圈的每個反覆項目提供下一個集合中的物件。Each iteration of the loop provides the next object in the collection. 集合物件表示本機電腦上定義的時區，它不一定會提供在所有的時段內所有時區的完整資訊。The collection of objects represents time zones defined on the local computer; it does not necessarily provide complete information for all time zones during all time periods. 如果您的應用程式需要在本機電腦上找不到的時區，您可以建立自訂的時區使用多載方法。If your application requires time zones not found on the local computer, you can create custom time zones using the overloads of the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：建立沒有調整規則的時區](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-without-adjustment-rules.md)和[How to:建立有調整規則的時區](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create Time Zones Without Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-without-adjustment-rules.md) and [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). 您也可以判斷是否為個別的時區在本機電腦上所定義呼叫方法，並提供您想要擷取做為參數的時區的識別項。You can also determine whether an individual time zone is defined on the local computer by calling the method and providing the identifier of the time zone you want to retrieve as a parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取代表電腦上所定義的時區的時區物件的集合，並將其相關資訊寫入至文字檔。The following example retrieves a collection of time zone objects that represent the time zones defined on a computer and writes information about them to a text file. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/getsystemtimezones1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/getsystemtimezones1.vb#6)] [!code-powershell[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/powershell/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZone2.Class/PS/Timezone2_Examples.ps1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的時間範圍會包含目前時區調整規則的應用程式造成的任何差異。The returned time span includes any differences due to the application of adjustment rules to the current time zone. 不同於屬性，它會傳回 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 與時區標準時間之間的差異，因此，不會考慮調整規則。It differs from the property, which returns the difference between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and the time zone's standard time and, therefore, does not take adjustment rules into account. 如果`dateTime`參數的屬性未對應至時區物件，這個方法會執行傳回結果之前需要的轉換。If the `dateTime` parameter's property does not correspond to the time zone object, this method performs the necessary conversion before returning a result. 比方說，這種情形屬性是但時區物件不是當地時區。For example, this can occur if the property is but the time zone object is not the local time zone. 如果`dateTime`模稜兩可，或如果模稜兩可的轉換後的時間，這個方法會將解譯為標準時間的模稜兩可的時間。If `dateTime` is ambiguous, or if the converted time is ambiguous, this method interprets the ambiguous time as a standard time. 如果`dateTime`是無效的這個方法會傳回反映 UTC 與時區標準時間之間的差異的物件。If `dateTime` is invalid, this method returns a object that reflects the difference between UTC and the time zone's standard time. 作業的方法大致方法類別。The method is similar in operation to the method of the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將方法搭配不同的時區與具有不同的日期值屬性值。The following example illustrates the use of the method with different time zones and with date values that have different property values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 時區識別項會唯一識別特定時區的索引鍵字串。The time zone identifier is a key string that uniquely identifies a particular time zone. 在 Windows 系統上，它會對應至從 Windows 系統與登錄 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 區域 」 分支的子機碼[ICU 文件庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)Linux 和 macOS 上。On Windows systems, it corresponds to the subkeys of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zone branch of the registry on Windows systems and from the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone) on Linux and macOS. 它可以做為參數傳遞方法具現化物件，表示特定時區。It can be passed as a parameter to the method to instantiate a object that represents a particular time zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然在 Windows 登錄中的索引鍵名稱最多可有 255 個字元，但建議您指派給自訂的時區識別項是 32 個字元或更少。Although a key name in the Windows registry can be a maximum of 255 characters, we recommend that an identifier that you assign to a custom time zone be 32 characters or fewer. 較長的識別項，就越有可能不正確的索引鍵名稱將會提供擷取它時。The longer the identifier, the greater the probability that an incorrect key name will be supplied when retrieving it. 值屬性通常是，但不是一定相同屬性。The value of the property is usually, but not always, identical to that of the property. 識別項的通用協調是時區的 UTC。The identifier of the Coordinated Universal Time zone is UTC. ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個在本機電腦上所定義的時區識別的項。The following example lists the identifier of each of the time zones defined on the local computer. span.span: if the parameter is ambiguous; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模稜兩可的時間落在目前時區的時間範圍內。An ambiguous time falls within a range of times for the current time zone. 這表示它可以是標準時間或時間所產生的調整規則的應用程式。This means it can be either a standard time or a time that results from the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，時鐘設定為傳回標準時間到日光節約時間時產生模稜兩可的時間。Typically, ambiguous times result when the clock is set to return to standard time from daylight saving time. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的說明。See the Example section for an illustration. Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 有任何模稜兩可的時間;兩者皆非的時間不支援日光節約時間的區域。Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) has no ambiguous times; neither do time zones that do not support daylight saving time. 因此，這些時區具有沒有調整規則和呼叫方法永遠會傳回`false`。Therefore, these time zones have no adjustment rules and calls to the method always return `false`. 遵循日光節約時間的時區，此方法的精確的行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性和物件，如下表所示。For time zones that do observe daylight saving time, the precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property and the object, as the following table shows. |TimeZoneInfo 物件類型TimeZoneInfo object type|Kind 屬性值Kind property value|行為Behavior| |------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------| || 或 or |決定是否`dateTime`參數模稜兩可。Determines whether the `dateTime` parameter is ambiguous.| |||將轉換`dateTime`為當地時間，然後決定該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the local time and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| || 或 or |傳回 `false`。Returns `false`.| |||如果`dateTime`模稜兩可，假設它是標準時間，將它轉換成 UTC，並傳回`false`。If `dateTime` is ambiguous, assumes it is a standard time, converts it to UTC, and returns `false`.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.| 或 or |將轉換`dateTime`指定時區的時間，然後決定該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the time in the specified time zone and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.||決定是否`dateTime`模稜兩可。Determines whether `dateTime` is ambiguous.| ## Examples 在太平洋時區，日光節約時間結束於上午 2:00In the Pacific Time zone, daylight saving time ends at 2:00 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4日日。on November 4, 2007. 下列範例會將時間傳遞在一分鐘的時間間隔，從上午 12:59The following example passes the time at one-minute intervals from 12:59 A.M. 於 2007 年 11 月 4日日到到上午 2:01on November 4, 2007, to 2:01 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4 日，若要方法的代表太平洋時區的物件。on November 4, 2007, to the method of a object that represents the Pacific Time zone. 主控台輸出指出，所有的時間，從上午 1:00。The console output indicates that all times from 1:00 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4日日到至 1:59 A.M.。on November 4, 2007, to 1:59 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4 日，是模稜兩可。on November 4, 2007, are ambiguous. remarks.format: ## Remarks 模稜兩可的時間落在目前時區的時間範圍內。An ambiguous time falls within a range of times for the current time zone. 這表示它可以是標準時間或時間所產生的調整規則的應用程式。This means that it can be either a standard time or a time that results from the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，時鐘設定為傳回標準時間到日光節約時間時產生模稜兩可的時間。Typically, ambiguous times result when the clock is set to return to standard time from daylight saving time. Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 有任何模稜兩可的時間;兩者皆非的時間不支援日光節約時間的區域。Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) has no ambiguous times; neither do time zones that do not support daylight saving time. 方法的精確的行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性`dateTimeOffset`參數和目前的時區。The precise behavior of the method depends on the relationship between the property of the `dateTimeOffset` parameter and the current time zone. 如果值屬性是可能與目前時區的 UTC 位移，則這個方法會判斷是否該日期和時間模稜兩可。If the value of the property is a possible offset from the UTC of the current time zone, the method determines whether that date and time is ambiguous. 否則，它會將轉換`dateTimeOffset`為目前的時區的時間，然後決定是否該日期和時間模稜兩可。Otherwise, it converts `dateTimeOffset` to the time in the current time zone, and then determines whether that date and time is ambiguous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值所代表的時區之間的關聯性會影響物件並屬性`dateTime`參數，如下表所示。The return value of is affected by the relationship between the time zone represented by the object and the property of the `dateTime` parameter, as the following table shows. |TimeZoneInfo 物件TimeZoneInfo object|DateTime.Kind 屬性DateTime.Kind property|結果Result| |-------------------------|----------------------------|------------| ||`DateTimeKind.Local`|決定是否`dateTime`是日光節約時間。Determines whether `dateTime` is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Utc`|將轉換`dateTime`與 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 為當地時間，並判斷它是否日光節約時間。Converts `dateTime` from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to local time and determines whether it is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Unspecified`|假設`dateTime`代表當地時間，並判斷它是否日光節約時間。Assumes that `dateTime` represents local time and determines whether it is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Local`、 `DateTimeKind.Unspecified`或 `DateTimeKind.Utc``DateTimeKind.Local`, `DateTimeKind.Unspecified`, or `DateTimeKind.Utc`|傳回`false`（UTC 不支援日光節約時間）。Returns `false` (UTC does not support daylight saving time).| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Local`|將當地時間轉換為相等的時間物件，並接著會判斷是否後者是日光節約時間。Converts the local time to the equivalent time of the object and then determines whether the latter is daylight saving time.| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Utc`|將 UTC 轉換為相等的時間物件，並接著會判斷是否後者是日光節約時間。Converts UTC to the equivalent time of the object and then determines whether the latter is daylight saving time.| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Unspecified`|決定是否`dateTime`是日光節約時間。Determines whether `dateTime` is daylight saving time.| 如果所代表的時區物件不支援日光節約時間，此方法一律會傳回`false`。If the time zone represented by the object does not support daylight saving time, the method always returns `false`. 時間區域，其中包括一些，不會遵守日光節約時間。A number of time zones, including , do not observe daylight saving time. 若要判斷是否時區支援日光節約時間，擷取的值及其屬性。To determine whether a time zone supports daylight saving time, retrieve the value of its property. 如果`dateTime`參數指定模稜兩可的時間，以目前物件的時區方法會解譯`dateTime`做為標準時間，並傳回`false`如果其屬性是或.If the `dateTime` parameter specifies an ambiguous time in the current object's time zone, the method interprets `dateTime` as standard time and returns `false` if its property is or . 如果屬性是，這個方法會選取正確模稜兩可的時間，並指出它是否為日光節約時間。If the property is , this method will select the correct ambiguous time and indicate whether it is a daylight saving time. 因為方法會傳回`false`日期和模稜兩可的時間 （也就是日期和時間表示標準時間或特定時區的日光節約時間）方法可以搭配方法，以判斷時間是否可能日光節約時間。Because the method can return `false` for a date and time that is ambiguous (that is, a date and time that can represent either a standard time or a daylight saving time in a particular time zone), the method can be paired with the method to determine whether a time may be a daylight saving time. 因為模稜兩可的時間，日光節約時間和標準時間，也是會可以先呼叫方法，來決定是否將日期和時間可能是日光節約時間。Because an ambiguous time is one that can be both a daylight saving time and a standard time, the method can be called first to determine whether a date and time may be a daylight saving time. 如果此方法會傳回`false`，則可以呼叫方法，來決定是否值是日光節約時間。If the method returns `false`, the method can be called to determine whether the value is a daylight saving time. 下列範例說明這項技巧。The following example illustrates this technique. remarks.format: ## Remarks 無效的時間落在目前的調整規則的應用程式因為無法對應為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區的時間範圍內。An invalid time falls within a range of times for the current time zone that cannot be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) due to the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，當時間往前移動日光節約時間，就會發生無效的時間。Typically, invalid times occur when the time moves ahead for daylight saving time. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的說明。See the Example section for an illustration. 值的屬性`dateTime`參數會影響是否`dateTime`表示無效的時間，如下表所示。The value of the property of the `dateTime` parameter affects whether `dateTime` represents an invalid time, as the following table shows. |DateTime.Kind 屬性DateTime.Kind property|TimeZoneInfo 物件 （如果適用）TimeZoneInfo object (if applicable)|行為Behavior| |----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|--------------| |||判斷時間是否無效。Determines whether the time is invalid.| || 或非當地時區為準。 or a non-local time zone.|將轉換`dateTime`的時間物件，然後傳回`false`。Converts `dateTime` to the time of the object and returns `false`.| ||不適用。Not applicable.|假設`dateTime`的時間物件，並判斷它是否無效。Assumes `dateTime` is the time of the object and determines whether it is invalid.| ||不適用。Not applicable.|傳回 `false`。Returns `false`.| ## Examples 在太平洋時區，日光節約時間開始於上午 2:00In the Pacific Time zone, daylight saving time begins at 2:00 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日。on April 2, 2006. 下列程式碼在一分鐘的時間間隔，從上午 1:59 傳遞時間The following code passes the time at one-minute intervals from 1:59 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日到到凌晨 3:01on April 2, 2006, to 3:01 A.M. 在 2006 年 4 月 2 日至方法的代表太平洋時區的物件。on April 2, 2006, to the method of a object that represents the Pacific Time zone. 主控台輸出指出，所有時間，從上午 2:00The console output indicates that all times from 2:00 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日到到上午 2:59on April 2, 2006, to 2:59 A.M. 在 2006 年 4 月 2 日，均為無效。on April 2, 2006, are invalid. summary.span: 取得代表本地時區的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the local time zone.
An object that represents the local time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地時區是程式碼執行所在的電腦上的時區。The local time zone is the time zone on the computer where the code is executing. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該一律存取透過當地時區為準屬性，而不是指派當地時區指派給物件變數。You should always access the local time zone through the property rather than assigning the local time zone to a object variable. 這可防止物件變數失效呼叫方法。This prevents the object variable from being invalidated by a call to the method. 在 Windows 系統上所傳回的物件屬性會反映設定**自動調整日光節約時間的時鐘**核取方塊控制項台中**日期和時間**應用程式。On Windows systems, the object returned by the property reflects the setting of the **Automatically adjust clock for Daylight Saving Time** checkbox in the Control Panel **Date and Time** application. 如果未選取此核取方塊，當地時區的快取的副本就會包含任何日光節約時間資訊。If the checkbox is unchecked, the cached copy of the local time zone contains no daylight saving time information. 這表示：This means that: - 當地時區的方法會傳回其長度為零的陣列。The local time zone's method returns an array whose length is zero. - 當地時區屬性會傳回`false`。The local time zone's property returns `false`. - 本地時區已沒有模稜兩可或不正確的時間 (所有對或是傳回`false`)。The local time zone has no ambiguous or invalid times (all calls to or return `false`). - 所有呼叫具有個別的本地時間傳回 false。All calls to with individual local times return false. 這不是 true，不過，如果當地時區的參考會使用擷取方法。This is not true, however, if a reference to the local time zone is retrieved using the method. 屬性會對應至屬性類別。The property corresponds to the property of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，代表當地時區，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents the local time zone and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/ShowTimeZoneNames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/ShowTimeZoneNames1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不會在 Windows 系統登錄中定義的時區所依賴的應用程式或[ICU 程式庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)可以使用 Linux 和 macOScan方法來具現化為的所需的時區物件。Applications that rely on time zones that are not typically defined in the registry of Windows systems or the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone) on Linux and macOScan can use the method to instantiate the necessary time zones as objects. 應用程式接著可以呼叫將時區的物件轉換為字串的方法。The application can then call the method to convert the time zone object to a string. 物件應該也儲存在其中的應用程式可以擷取它時所需的位置。The object should also be stored in a location where the application can retrieve it when needed. 可能的位置包括：Possible locations include: - 在 Windows 系統上登錄。The registry on Windows systems. - 應用程式資源檔。An application resource file. - 外部檔案，例如文字檔案。An external file, such as a text file. ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試擷取南極大陸/南極從本機系統的時區。The following example tries to retrieve the Antarctica/South Pole time zone from the local system. 如果失敗，此程式碼會嘗試擷取應用程式目錄中的文字檔案的相關時區資訊。If it fails, the code tries to retrieve information about the time zone from a text file in the application directory. 如果此嘗試失敗，程式碼會建立時區，並將資訊寫入至文字檔。If this attempt fails, the code creates the time zone and writes information about it to the text file. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone/cs/System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone/vb/System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone.vb#4)]

span.span: An object that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是內建的物件;相關的資訊物件不從 Windows 系統上，以及從登錄擷取[ICU 文件庫](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone)Linux 和 macOS 上。This is a built-in object; information about this object is not retrieved from the registry on Windows systems and from the [ICU Library](http://userguide.icu-project.org/datetime/timezone) on Linux and macOS. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該一律存取透過 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 區域屬性，而不是指派至 UTC 時區物件變數。You should always access the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone through the property rather than assigning the UTC time zone to a object variable. 這可防止物件變數失效呼叫方法。This prevents the object variable from being invalidated by a call to the method. 國際標準時間之前稱做為格林威治標準時間 (GMT)。Coordinated Universal Time was previously known as Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，表示 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/TimeZone2_Examples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/TimeZone2_Examples.vb#3)]

related.span: 如何：存取預先定義的 UTC 和本機時區物件

span.span: How to: Access the Predefined UTC and Local Time Zone Objects
